entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sachs Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:30 PM MST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -34.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sachs Harbour Airport 01:00 AM MST Sunday 05 March 2023
Temperature: -34.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -52
Dewpoint: -38.1°C
Wind: N 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 37. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 8:28 PM MST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 52 in the morning and minus 42 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 8:28 PM MST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 33. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 41 in the evening and minus 47 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 8:28 PM MST Saturday 04 March 2023
